H0.text: Zygote is the diploid cell formed by the fusion of haploid gametes in sexual reproduction.

H1.text: Gonad is the diploid cell formed by the fusion of haploid gametes in sexual reproduction.

H2.text: Fetus is the diploid cell formed by the fusion of haploid gametes in sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Gamete is the diploid cell formed by the fusion of haploid gametes in sexual reproduction.

A4.text: a released ovum (a haploid secondary oocyte with replicate chromosome copies) and a haploid sperm cell (male gamete) combine to form a single diploid cell called the zygote
